feed.title: DockSTARTer Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.11.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add global defaults for turning on STORAGE mounts by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1967
  • Move the application and version info down in the usage text. by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1968
  • Add a version notice at start of execution. by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1969

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.11.1...v2025.07.11.2
